transArray.content: Good value for money. Although the room is a bit small, the breakfast is very good. It beats hotels in the same price range.

Dear guests, hello! We are very happy to see your endless love and praise for the hotel. Your love is an encouragement and a support for us. We will redouble our efforts and thank you for your support. Every affirmation is precious to us. We look forward to your visit again and wish you a happy life!
